instructions: To cut or copy text, touch and hold a word or image to display the selection options, then choose Copy or Cut. To paste the text, double-tap to place an insertion point and display the selection options, then choose Paste.
While playing video content, tap the Media Selection button . Choose from the list of available subtitles and captions.

Go to Settings > Accessibility > Subtitles & Captioning. If you prefer closed captioning or subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing when available, turn on Closed Captions + SDH. Tap Style, then choose an existing caption style or create a new style based on the following: Font, size, and color Background color and opacity Text opacity, edge style, and highlight
